setup-worktree: if [ ! -f .clasp.json ] && [ -f .clasp.json.example ]; then echo '‚ö†Ô∏è  .clasp.json not found. Copy .clasp.json.example to .clasp.json and configure your script ID'; fi
if [ ! -f .env ] && [ -f .env.example ]; then echo '‚ö†Ô∏è  .env not found. Copy .env.example to .env and configure your settings'; fi
if [ -f .clasp.json ] && [ -f .env ]; then echo '‚úÖ Configuration files found'; fi
echo '  ‚Ä¢ Run "npm run setup" for interactive configuration'
echo '  ‚Ä¢ Run "npm run clasp:login" to authenticate with Google'
echo '  ‚Ä¢ Run "npm run deploy" to push code to Apps Script'
